pages.title: Ocean Sunfish
pages.text: Adults typically weigh between 247 and 2,000 kg ($(o)545 and 4,409 lb).$(br2)The species is native to tropical and temperate waters around the world.$(br2)It resembles a fish head with a tail, and its main body is flattened laterally.

pages.title: Ocean Sunfish
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: untamedwilds:chum$(br2)Number of Offspring: 5$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
